name: Accepting cookies hides the banner

testSteps.description: Given I am checking start page

exception.message: Expected enabled element was not enabled

rootCause.message: Expected condition failed: waiting for By.className: nhsuk-cookie-banner__link_accept_analytics to be clickable (tried for 10 second(s) with 100 milliseconds interval)

no such element: Unable to locate element: {"method":"css selector","selector":".nhsuk\-cookie\-banner__link_accept_analytics"}
